title: How to prepare for the NEET for 2021 in just 5 months - Quora

response.answer_text: FIRST OF ALL YOU SHOULD BE DETERMINED FOR CRACKING SUCH A COMPETITIVE EXAM. SECONDLY YOU SHOULD REMAIN MOTIVATED THROUGHOUT YOUR JOURNEY TILL THE DAY OF NEET 2021 These 7–8 Months is the ultimate time for your exam. So utilize that consciously. It's time to pull up your socks and get ready for your journey with full devotion and maximal hard work. Some important points while preparing ; 1. Don’t Study Biology all the time.Most of the student think that by studying more to biology, they can gain a good Rank in NEET. But it is not true because you have to gain good marks in Physics and Chemistry also. Without scoring good marks in Chemistry and Physics you can not secure a good Rank. Therefore If you think that your biology is ready for the exam, then give extra time to physics and chemistry. 2. Make Aim For 620+Make your mindset that you have to score 620+ since the NEET exam is going to be easy next year thats what it seems from this year and the last year for which you have to solve at least 35 questions of Physics 40 questions of Chemistry 85 questions of Biology 3. Join Test SeriesJoin Test Series and analyze your capacity in solving the maximum questions. Join any Online test series (Allen’s online test series) since they provide you with syllabus for each tests which are on every alternate sundays. By preparing each test , giving exam with proper environment helps a lot in facing the real exam.Do prepare for each exam properly as said earlier so that your won’t face any problem in last months. 4. Never Avoid Biology NCERTAlways remember that In NEET, Maximum questions come from NCERT. If you really want to solve more than 85 questions in Biology, you have to read NCERT thoroughly and with full attention. Remember Each and every line of NCERT , Each diagram and its description is important for the exam. 5. Do not avoid Physics and Chemistry NCERT Read the NCERT chapters thoroughly and revise all the concepts properly. Since most of the questions even in these 2 subjects are from the NCERT books. Physics and Chemistry NCERTs are equally important as the biology one. So dont ignore it. And Do solve the examples , intext questions and the exercise questions given at the back as they are very important since direct questions have been seen from them. 6.Try to Solve more and more questionsTry to complete Previous year questions chapterwise for each subject thoroughly atleast 2–3 times. Since this time there were many questions which were directly picked up from the previous yr papers. Solving them could be an advantage over others. If possible Do give a try to NCERT EXEMPLAR problems in all 3 subjects. They are very good in clearing concepts. 7.Avoid StressThese days many students start to think unnecessary negative things regarding the exam and result. Try to avoid stress since these thoughts can hinder your final performance. I am sure these tips would definetly help you. ALL THE BEST !!

HONEST ADVICE FOLLOW IT HONESTLY 6 month time in our hand use it wisely try to study more offline as possible according to situation online study is like movie watching do not waste your time on youtube for study .BIOLOGYtry to make notes of n.c.e.r.t points that not easily learn or remeber keep it up with u learn by heartthen follow it try to finish N.C.E.R.T minimum 12times every revision remeber one thing take less time then first revisionCHEMISTRYPHYSICAL CHEMISTRY …MAKE FORMULA CHART OF ALL PHY.CHEMISTRY CHAPTER and LEARN BY HEARTrevise it regularly take it in your blood like abcd learn primary schl.INORGANIC CHEMISTRYa. read only n.c.e.r.t and revise it very frequently on daily bases fix daily time to read it and learn all the rxn by haert do previous year paper inorganic question ORGANIC CHEMISTRYbelive me in organic chemistry do only n.c.e.r.t line by line learn it take it in blooddo more question as you can in organic chemistry it help you to retainread your classroom notes and n.c.e.r.t only and do only extra effort for practise more questionPHYSICSPRACTISE MAKE A MAN FARFECT remember itfollow your teacher and saale ko chaat jao time nhi hmachanics me jada timemt waste krnado lot of question as you canbuiled thinking reasoning skill; thanku for reading 4 more follow me
